document.heading: Tobacco Settlement Trust Fund and Tobacco Settlement Financing Amendment Act of 2006

history.narrative: Law 16-142, the “Tobacco Settlement Trust Fund and Tobacco Settlement Financing Amendment Act of 2006”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-605 which was referred to the Committee on the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 4, 2006, and May 2, 2006, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 19, 2006, it was assigned Act No. 16-383 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-142 became effective on July 25, 2006.
